# R for data science workshop {-}

The published version for this module can be found on my bookdown site [2024_r4ds-ggplot2](https://bookdown.org/ggiaever/2024_r4ds-ggplot2).

This is a workshop based on the ggplot visulization sections of Hadley Wickham's book [2nd edition of "R for Data Science"](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/)(see README.md)
